Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Expectorant \Ex*pec"to*rant\, a. [L. expectorans, p. pr. of expectorare to drive from the breast: cf. F. expectorant.] (Med.) Tending to facilitate expectoration or to promote discharges of mucus, etc., from the lungs or throat. -- n. An expectorant medicine. [1913 Webster]
expectorant n : a medicine promoting expectoration [syn: {expectorator}]
